overview: Nobuta Yabuta is a beginning teacher appointed to the prestigious girls' high school Sakura Gakuen, but in fact, he is afraid of women. There are five girls who are supposed to become first-class ladies in his classroom. In order to graduate, they must do just one thing - be kissed by their teacher. They tempt Yabuta in every possible means so that they may win a kiss from him...
title: Renai Senka
